thread.section_title: Government Policy, Business and Technology: i360 Gov
thread.title: ED Names First OER Advisor

title: ED Names First OER Advisor
text:
21 ED Names First OER Advisor 
Campus Technology: The United States Department of Education has selected its first "open education" advisor. Andrew Marcinek's new job in the Office of Education Technology (OET) is to help K-12 and colleges and universities learn about open educational resources (OER), free digital teaching, learning and research resources available in the public domain.
